snippet: Under investigation is $725,000 of the $7 million the heiress Rachel Mellon had given John Edwards since 2004.
abstract: Witnesses for the prosecution in the corruption trial of former Sen John Edwards testify that Edwards routinely asked heiress Rachel Mellon for donations for needs beyond his political campaigns; defense lawyers argue instead that Mellon's money, which Edwards used to cover up his affair with Rielle Hunter, was never intended to be used for his 2008 presidential election campaign but was just a gift from a friend.
lead_paragraph: Under investigation is $725,000 of the $7 million the heiress Rachel Mellon had given John Edwards since 2004.

headline.main: Patron’s Contributions and Their Intent Are Focus at Edwards Trial
